titleStmt.title: The poore vvise-mans admonition unto all the plaine people of London, and the neighbor-places. To strengthen them in the houre of temptation, that they may be happy and exemplary instruments to all other people, in preserving the city, Parliament, and whole nation, from imminent and sudden destruction.
titleStmt.author: Walwyn, William, 1600-1681.

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to William Walwyn; this attribution rejected by McMichael and Taft, The writings of William Walwyn, p.530.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
